name: Amelia vs the Goblin Mafia
description:
This game was made in a little over a week for the Narrative Driven Game Jam.

Amelia vs the Goblin Mafia is a prototype for an action-adventure deck building RPG. Choose from various abilities to build a skill set that matches your playstyle.

In this jam version, only one class of abilities exist, rage abilities. There are 4 more ability classes planned, but time ran short to implement them.
